short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zelda new tab wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zelda new tab wallpaper theme for fans.

Comes with:
- Search bar
- Timer, and advanced calculator.
- Draggable, and minimizable sticky notes.
- Draggable and editable shortcuts.
- Date & Time.
- Wallpaper customization.
- Dim background to your preference for better visibility.
- Light and Dark theme.
- Lots of customizable features in setting.
